summary_detail.value: The MT Army National Guard will be supporting work on the Lolo Peak Fire by providing 54 personnel to assist with security at road blocks. They will be arriving to the area in the late afternoon on Sept. 1 and begin work immediately. If evacuations do occur it will be local law enforcement making notifications, not military

title: Additional assistance for road blocks (Lolo Peak Fire Wildfire)
